data.prayer: Father, encourage the 157 believers in Lahij to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lahij, Yemen
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Lahij to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 157 believers in the state of Lahij the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Lahij.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Arab, Sudanese people.
Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Lahij, Yemen to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 750,607, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Lahij, Yemen.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

location.name: Lahij
location.cities_list: Laḩij, Al Madakisha, Al Qabyal, Najd Al Tha‘ub, Al Musaymīr
location.cities_list_w_pop: Laḩij (23,375), Al Madakisha (5,000), Al Qabyal (2,000), Najd Al Tha‘ub (1,000), Al Musaymīr (3)
